GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.23 to before v4.14.276
GSD.description:
mm/pages_alloc.c: don't create ZONE_MOVABLE beyond the end of a node

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.276 by commit 4d6d259e5fa3647b5bc41a17276464ab8c2e1a44, it was introduced in version v2.6.23 by commit 2a1e274acf0b1c192face19a4be7c12d4503eaaf. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: mm/pages_alloc.c: don't create ZONE_MOVABLE beyond the end of a node
OSV.details:
